S.text: Profile does not contain faction of target.
Don't show me this warning again
Press the key you want to record. Do not use Alt, Shift, or Control!
Please enter a single character for "Char" types of keys.
Please enter a virtual character code starting with 0x or click the "Pick" button.
Please enter a virtual character code starting with 0x or click the "Pick" button.
No spell is selected. Use a Char/VChar for this key or open up the game and attach Glider to load the list of spells.

Welcome to the profile wizard! To begin creating a profile, move your character in the game to where you wish the profile to begin.
In addition, choose a name for the profile below so you can load it again later.
Walk around and kill the monsters you want Glider to kill when you run this profile. Glider is recording your movements, so avoid moving off of your path if possible.

Continue walking your path and killing monsters. When you have returned to your starting location, Glider will move to the next step of the wizard. If you don't want your profile to run in a circle, click "Next;" when you have reached the end of your path.
Your starting location is {0} yards away and {1} degrees to the {2} of your character.
The closest waypoint is {0} yards away and {1} degrees to the {2} of your character.
Run from your current location to the profile in order to continue.

Finally, you may choose to record vendor waypoints, which is how Glider finds its way from your hearth location back to the profile. Along the way, you can select merchants for repair/ammo and food/water.
To begin, move your character to your hearth location and click "Next;"
Note: make sure you know where the food/water and ammo/repair vendors are in your area before beginning!
Skip vendor waypoints for this profile.
All done! The profile has been saved and is now ready for use.
To record vendor waypoints, begin by moving up to the merchant who sells food and water. Right-click on the vendor to open talk and then "Next;".
Now move carefully to the vendor who repairs and, if you have a hunter, sells your ammunition. Right-click on the vendor to talk and then click "Next;".
Select a vendor for food/water before clicking "Next;".
Select a vendor for ammo/repair before clicking "Next;".
Now move carefully to the closest profile waypoint. Do not mount or otherwise speed up your character during this process.
Run from your current location to the profile in order to continue.

Vendor waypoints are a feature of Glider Elite. You can create a profile with them without Elite, but your version of Glider will not be able to use them.
Do you want to record vendor waypoints anyway?
Create this profile without the wizard.
Please enter a profile name before continuing.
Kill at least one monster before continuing so that Glider knows what you want it to kill.
Move around in the game to create a path for Glider to follow before continuing.
The profile named "{0}" already exists. Do you want to overwrite it with a new profile?

To add ghost waypoints to this profile and allow Glider to resurrect when you die, move your character to the nearest graveyard now. Or simply get killed (don't forget to remove your gear first!) and the game will move you to the closest graveyard automatically.
When you are at the graveyard, click "Next >>" to begin recording ghost waypoints.
Glider is now recording the path from the graveyard to your profile. Run to the closest waypoint and be careful to avoid obstructions or dropoffs.
Skip ghost waypoints for this profile.
This custom class does not support the help function.
Please enter a valid numeric value for "{0}".
Please enter a valid numeric value for "{0}" or leave it blank.
This profile has no waypoints yet.
This profile has no ghost waypoints yet.
This profile has no vendor waypoints yet.

This profile is configured without a faction list, which may cause Glider to attack warlock/hunter pets and friendly totems.
For more information on factions, click "Help".
Do you want to continue?
Don't remind me about this again.
Don't forget to set action bars!

In order for Glider to run properly, you need to set up two action bars in the game with spells and abilities for your character.
Do you want to open the help file for this class' action bar now?
Don't remind me about this again.
Glider was not started with Launchpad. For maximum safety, only start Glider (and the game) by clicking "Launch WoW" from the Launchpad window.
Don't remind me about this again.
Avoid hostiles when looting and resting
Auto resurrect if profile has ghost waypoints
Delete prior chat log on start
Stop looting when inventory is full
Stop gliding when inventory is full
There are no unidentified debuffs to be managed. Check the help file for "Debuffs" under Advanced topics.

The following new effects were on your character after the last use of Glider. For any that are debuffs you want to remove, double-click the name of the spell to tell Glider what kind of debuff it is.
Note: do not add positive buffs, such as Demon Armor, to the list!
Select the type of debuff for this spell from the buttons below. If this spell is not one of the choices below, click "Cancel"

The game has stopped. Since Glider was started in Launchpad mode, it will not be able to attach again unless you restart via Launchpad.

Background mode requires Launchpad options "Shadow enable" to be enabled and "Unload after hide" to be disabled. Do you want Glider to make those changes now?
